pages.text: Some rites speak of a demon known as Leonard, and many names he goes by, such as The Black Goat of the Woods, Azazel, The Morning Star, and The False King of the Templars. However, many of these are contradictory, and he seems to be a demon that resides over witches.

Those who summon him are usually forced to indulge in a foul mixture known as the Stew of the Grotesque while holding a Green Candle and wearing a full set of any witch robes, in order to receive his blessing.

pages.title: Summoning
pages.text: Summoning Master Leonard is rather difficult, the blood of a lamb needs to be spilled for the ritual. I have documented the rite as follows:
